analyzed: rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan phreng 'bum phrag dum 'di lta ste /

translated: white pearls, red pearls, stainless pearls, golden pearls, moon-like pearls, lotus-like pearls, and pearls with the color of the sky.

analyzed: mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo //

original: 'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa /
analyzed: 'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa /

analyzed: kha dog 'bum phrag du ma / dri zhim pa / blta na sdug pa /

analyzed: yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo //

analyzed: me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to //

analyzed: bar snang la'ang 'brug sgra chen po bsgrags par gyur to //

analyzed: aa ga ru dang / tsandan gyi phye ma dag dang / tsandan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo //

analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de

analyzed: bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga @183a *//

analyzed: ltas lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to the venerable Mahā­maudgalyāyana,

analyzed: moonggal gyi bu; 'di ni /
translated: “Maudgalyāyana,

analyzed: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no //

translated: Soon after the Blessed One had said this, the nāga king Sāgara, surrounded and attended by 8,400,000 nāgas and 72,000,000 nāga girls, arrived from the ocean.

analyzed: bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /
translated: incense, perfume, flower garlands, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, victory banners, flags, cymbals, and musical instruments, and singing and chanting in the hundreds of thousands, they went to the place where the Blessed One was residing. When they arrived, they bowed their heads to the feet of the Blessed One and offered to him the flowers,

original: bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /

translated: incense, perfume, flower garlands, ointments, and so on, as well as the parasols, victory banners, flags, cymbals, and musical instruments that they had brought, and made offerings to the Blessed One. Then, together with their retinues of queens,

original: gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i @183b tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i @183b tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
translated: Together with his retinue of relatives, he then praised the Blessed One with these fitting verses:

analyzed: 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa //
translated: “You who wish to benefit the world in the world, worshipped by the world, bestowing eyes upon the world,

analyzed: 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos padma chus mi chags pa bzhin //
translated: Born in the world, unstained by worldly defilements, like a lotus untouched by water,

analyzed: 'jig rten snang ba rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa //
translated: Illuminating the world, possessing three eyes, bestowing happiness upon the world,

original: 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Sun of the world, skilled in conditions, foremost in the world, to you I pay homage today.

analyzed: dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags //

original: 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs //
analyzed: 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs //
translated: Leader, you have burned away afflictions, dust, darkness, impurities, and harshness, and scorched the sprouts.

original: snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags //
analyzed: snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags //
translated: Out of compassion, you give the seven riches to beings, and with love you protect them.

original: bsod snyoms zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bsod snyoms zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow my head to you, the field of generosity, the firm kinsman of the world.🔽The hair between your eyebrows blazes like the fire at the end of time, like a jasmine flower, the moon, or a conch shell.

original: khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kunda zla ba dung mdog 'dra; ;'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kunda zla ba dung mdog 'dra; ;'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: Even the gods in the Brahma realm cannot see the crown of your head.🔽The light that radiates from your moon-like face illuminates the entire world.

original: zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad; ;de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur //
analyzed: zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad; ;de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur //
translated: Those who are touched by it become happy, even the beings in the hells.

original: khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par @184a *//
analyzed: khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par @184a *//
translated: Your speech is very pleasant, like the sound of the lute. It satisfies the mind, like the sound of the cuckoo bird.

original: bgyid; ;lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste //
analyzed: bgyid; ;lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste //
translated: It surpasses the voices of devas and humans, and is pure and clean.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid //
translated: It pacifies attachment, anger, darkness, and dust, and illuminates wisdom.

original: dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags //
analyzed: dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags //
translated: It brings joy, delight, and great happiness, and reveals liberation.

original: khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te //
analyzed: khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te //
translated: Your wisdom is unimpeded and unattached throughout the three times.

original: khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud //
translated: You know without exception the lesser, middling, and superior conduct of sentient beings.

original: gang dag gis ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba //
analyzed: gang dag gis ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba //
translated: You know exactly the different faculties, intentions, migrations, and liberations of all.

analyzed: thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud pa de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: We pay homage to you, who know all of this in an instant.

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags blta'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed //
translated: And though a hundred times ten million Māras, striving to find an opportunity,

analyzed: khyod kyi thad du lhags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g-yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba //
translated: Came to you, O Compassionate One, you did not move from your seat.

analyzed: mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad //
translated: You, O Lord, conquered them with truth, with the glory of your vow, with your virtues, and with love.

analyzed: de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngom par 'dzin //

translated: Like foam, a flash of lightning, a bubble, a plantain tree, an illusion, a mirage.

original: gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de //
analyzed: gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de //
translated: Where there is no cause, there is no conception; you have always known that these things are without self.

original: de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga bskyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga bskyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os //
translated: In this way, you, O Lord, are worthy of liberation, since you have generated the five desires of the migrating beings.🔽For the sake of which you have relied on austerities for many quintillions of eons,🔽For the sake of which you have always benefited migrating beings and made offerings to the guides,

original: gang gi don du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang // gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang // gang gi don du sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi //

translated: For the sake of which you have always relied on generosity, perfect restraint, self-control, and patience,

analyzed: rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur //

translated: Then, after the nāga king Sāgara had praised the Bhagavān with these fitting verses, he said to the Bhagavān,

analyzed: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo //

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

translated: “Lord of nāgas,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: tshul khrims srung bar byed /

analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom par byed /

analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa thams cad 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: klu'i bdag po /

analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / sems dben par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is the perception of the isolation of body, speech, and mind.

original: tshul khrims yongs su srung ba ste /

original: lus dang / ngag dang / sems la'ang mi rten /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / sems la'ang mi rten /

original: 'jig rten 'di la'ang mi rten /

original: nang la'ang mi rten /
analyzed: nang la'ang mi rten /

analyzed: phyi rol la'ang mi rten / phung po la'ang mi rten / khams la'ang mi rten /
translated: It is not based on the outer.🔽It is not based on the aggregates.🔽It is not based on the elements.

original: skye mched la'ang mi rten /
analyzed: skye mched la'ang mi rten /
translated: It is not based on the sense sources.

original: byang chub la'ang mi rten /
analyzed: byang chub la'ang mi rten /

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi rten /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi rten /

analyzed: tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing shin tu rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: It is the discipline that does not give rise to conceit or pride.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i tshul khrims @202b zhes bya'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: bzod pa gang sgom pa rnam dag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu mi dmigs shing /

original: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ni /
translated: It is not based on the grasping at ‘I’ and ‘mine.’

analyzed: nang dag pa dang / sems can dag pa dang / chos thams cad dag pas bzod pa sgom pa yin te /

analyzed: de ni bzod pa'ang sgom la /

original: chos gang yang sgom par mi byed /

translated: It is not the cultivation of non-cultivation.🔽It is not the cultivation of any phenomena in order to produce them

analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed / chos gang yang zad par bya ba'i phyir ram /

original: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed /
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed /
translated: or to pacify them.

original: sems can bdag med pa dang / sems can dben pas kyang mi skrag /
analyzed: sems can bdag med pa dang / sems can dben pas kyang mi skrag /
translated: They are not terrified, nor do they become terrified.

original: mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'byung la bzod pa de'ang lus la dmigs pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa dang / sems la dmigs pas bzod par mi byed pa dang / de lus bshig pa'am /

translated: They do not cultivate patience by focusing on the body, speech, or mind.🔽When their bodies are being cut apart, their major and minor body parts being severed, they are patient, discerning them to be like grass, trees, walls, and so forth.🔽When they hear others speaking badly of them, they are patient, knowing that speech is incoherent, that speech is a remedy,

original: yan lag dang / nying lag rnams gcod pa na rtsva dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang 'dra bar so sor rtog cing bzod pa dang / de gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa thos na ngag ya ma bral dang / ngag gso ba dang /
analyzed: yan lag dang / nying lag rnams gcod pa na rtsva dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang 'dra bar so sor rtog cing bzod pa dang / de gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa thos na ngag ya ma bral dang / ngag gso ba dang /
translated: that speech is a collection, that speech is ungraspable, that speech is peaceful, and that speech is insubstantial.

analyzed: ngag gsag dang / ngag gzung du med pa dang / ngag zhi ba dang / ngag mi gnas pa shes nas bzod pa dang / de sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems gsar ma yin pa dang / sems @203a *//

original: rnying ma yin pa dang / gcig la gcig mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / skad cig gis 'jig pas med par 'gyur bar so sor rtog cing bzod la /
analyzed: rnying ma yin pa dang / gcig la gcig mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / skad cig gis 'jig pas med par 'gyur bar so sor rtog cing bzod la /
translated: They are impermanent because they are old, because they do not connect with each other, and because they disintegrate moment by moment.

original: mtshams sbyor ba med par mthong ba 'di ni /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba med par mthong ba 'di ni /
translated: Seeing that they do not connect is

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: called the bodhisattvas’ patience that is based on wisdom.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattvas’ effort that is based on wisdom?

original: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la /
translated: The bodhisattvas undertake effort in order to increase all their wholesome actions.

original: brtson 'grus rnam par 'phel ba des kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'phel ba dang / yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / des chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du bar rig nas chos gang yang bden par yongs su grub par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rnam par 'phel ba des kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'phel ba dang / yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / des chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du bar rig nas chos gang yang bden par yongs su grub par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /
translated: Knowing that all phenomena are included in the realm of phenomena, they do not see any phenomenon that is truly established.🔽They see that the world is based on falsehood and error.

original: mi bden pa phyin ci log la 'jig rten gnas pa'ang mthong ba dang / des de ltar shes rab rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba na chos rnams 'phel bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: mi bden pa phyin ci log la 'jig rten gnas pa'ang mthong ba dang / des de ltar shes rab rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba na chos rnams 'phel bar yang mi byed /
translated: When they view all phenomena through the purity of insight, they do not increase phenomena,

original: 'grib par yang mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad spungs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa dang / gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba dang / gang du'ang mi 'gro bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: 'grib par yang mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad spungs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa dang / gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba dang / gang du'ang mi 'gro bar rab tu shes te /
translated: nor do they decrease them. They know that all phenomena are not a heap, that they are not located in a place, that they are not located in a direction, that they do not come from anywhere, and that they do not go anywhere.

original: de de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas phyin @203b ci log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas phyin @203b ci log pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa /
translated: Endowed with such qualities, he or she teaches the Dharma to sentient beings in order to help them understand error correctly and as it is.

original: sems can de dag kyang yang dag par mi dmigs te; sems can mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can de dag kyang yang dag par mi dmigs te; sems can mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: And yet, those sentient beings are not apprehended. The nonapprehension of sentient beings is the nonapprehension of all phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sems can lam gtogs pa'i chos gang yang med la /
analyzed: sems can lam gtogs pa'i chos gang yang med la /
translated: There are no phenomena that are included within the path of sentient beings.

original: chos la ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang med mod kyi /
analyzed: chos la ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang med mod kyi /
translated: And yet, sentient beings are not separate from phenomena.

original: 'on kyang chos kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /🔽bdag gi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang chos kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni / bdag gi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: However, the essence of phenomena🔽is the essence of the self.

original: bdag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bdag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The essence of the self

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: is the essence of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The essence of all phenomena

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: is the essence of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol ba gang yin pa dang / btsal nas kyang chos kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol ba gang yin pa dang / btsal nas kyang chos kyang mi dmigs /
translated: And, having sought them, they do not observe any phenomena,🔽and they do not observe any non-phenomena.

original: chos ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs pa dang / tshol ba na'ang gang gis btsal ba dang / gang btsal ba dang / sus btsal ba de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs pa dang / tshol ba na'ang gang gis btsal ba dang / gang btsal ba dang / sus btsal ba de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: When they seek, they do not observe the one who seeks, what is sought, or the one who seeks.

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattvas’ diligence that is based on the domain of wisdom.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattvas’ concentration that is based on the domain of wisdom?

original: bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: It is the concentration that enters into the absorptions

original: mnyam pa nyid las kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid las kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: but does not decline from sameness

original: phun sum tshogs par yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / de bsam @204a *//
analyzed: phun sum tshogs par yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / de bsam @204a *//
translated: and does not become perfect.

original: gtan rnams kyang bsam gtan du byed la /
analyzed: gtan rnams kyang bsam gtan du byed la /
translated: It is the concentration that is the concentration

original: chos gang yang skyed par yang mi byed /
analyzed: chos gang yang skyed par yang mi byed /
translated: but does not produce any phenomena.

original: 'bri bar yang mi byed pa dang / yul thams cad la'ang mi rten par bsam gtan byed la /
analyzed: 'bri bar yang mi byed pa dang / yul thams cad la'ang mi rten par bsam gtan byed la /
translated: They do not write anything down, and they do not rely on any object when they practice concentration.

original: chos thams cad dang mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa med par yang bsam gtan byed pa dang / lus dang sems kyis kyang bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi bsam pa dang / bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba de dag mngon par sgrub par mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa med par yang bsam gtan byed pa dang / lus dang sems kyis kyang bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi bsam pa dang / bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba de dag mngon par sgrub par mi byed pa dang /
translated: They practice concentration in harmony with all phenomena, without any discord. They do not actualize the branches of concentration, the intention to concentrate, or the application of concentration, either physically or mentally.

translated: the four kinds of self-confidence, the four analytical knowledges, the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha, the thirty-two major marks and eighty minor marks of a great being, and the attainment of unsurpassed wisdom.

analyzed: de'i shes rab de'ang sems can thams cad gzugs med par sgrol ba'o //

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o //

original: chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'o //
analyzed: chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'o //

original: bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pa'o //

original: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o //

analyzed: sengge'i rtsal spyod pa'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o //

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba'o // g-yon phyogs kyi lam yongs su spong ba'o //

original: g-yas phyogs kyi lam du 'dzud pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas phyogs kyi lam du 'dzud pa'o //

original: de ltar ye shes rin po che @220b dang ldan pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar ye shes rin po che @220b dang ldan pa de ni /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga rtogs par khong du chud pa'o //

analyzed: spyan lnga'i mig bzang po dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil mtha' dag gi lus dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dpral ba dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi mgrin pa dang ldan pa'o //

original: mi skye ba'i lce dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i lce dang ldan pa'o //

original: mnyam pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'o //

original: chos thams cad la thos pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la thos pa 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: sgra thams cad rtogs pa'i thos pa dang ldan pa'o // dri la rjes su chags pa med pa'o //

analyzed: dri la khong khro ba med pa'o //

analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i skra dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa gsum gyi gtsug phud dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i thal gong shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: dbang po lnga'i lte ba shin tu zab pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi lto ba dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sta zur dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: ye shes mtha' yas pa'i spu'i khung bu dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa @221a *//

analyzed: thams cad 'dren pa'i lag pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid mthong ba dang / sgom pa'i sen mo dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: chos thams cad la som nyi med pa'i rtsi ba logs dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: sa'i rim pa'i tshul thob pa'i sgal tshigs dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: dus las mi 'da' bar chos ston pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the power of teaching the Dharma without missing the right time.

translated: He has the thighs of tranquility and insight, which are well developed through all the concentrations, liberations, meditative stabilizations, and absorptions.

analyzed: chos kyi nges pa la 'jug pa'i pus mo dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: chos ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i rje ngar dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: chos rtogs pas bsrungs pa'i rnam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i long bu dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: phyogs bcur 'gro pa'i rkang pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: bstan pa mtshams 'byor ba'i 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos gyon pa'o //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par spel ba'i tshig gis chos ston pa'o //

analyzed: mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dang bral ba'o //

translated: then King Inexhaustible Merit, together with his retinue, went to the Thus-Gone One, the divine king of Brahmā’s splendor, and bowed his head to the feet of that blessed one. They then sat to one side.

translated: He will obtain fearlessness in analysis, because he will engage in analysis according to the literal meaning. He will obtain fearlessness in eloquence, because he will teach with the aid of the superknowledges. He will obtain fearlessness in memory, because he will have a retentive memory.

original: gzhan gyi blo gros yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i phyir blo gros mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / som nyi myur du gcod pa'i phyir rtogs pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor mi lta ba'i phyir blo mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan gyi blo gros yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i phyir blo gros mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / som nyi myur du gcod pa'i phyir rtogs pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor mi lta ba'i phyir blo mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will attain fearlessness of mind in order to delight the minds of others. They will attain fearlessness of realization in order to swiftly cut through doubts. They will attain fearlessness of mind in order to not look to others.

original: tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khrol pa med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir spa gong ba med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dzum pa'i bzhin mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khrol pa med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir spa gong ba med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dzum pa'i bzhin mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will attain fearlessness of not being let down in order to be just as they say. They will attain fearlessness of not being disheartened in order to have pure discipline. They will attain fearlessness of a smiling face in order to have pure patience.

original: yang dag par dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir brtan pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / kla na ka mi tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir tshig gzung bar 'os pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mngon par mgu bar byed pa'i phyir tshig btsun pa mi 'jigs pa thob bar 'gyur @233a *//
analyzed: yang dag par dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir brtan pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / kla na ka mi tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir tshig gzung bar 'os pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mngon par mgu bar byed pa'i phyir tshig btsun pa mi 'jigs pa thob bar 'gyur @233a *//
translated: They attain the fearlessness of stability, because they do not deviate from their perfect commitments. They attain the fearlessness of being worthy to be relied upon, because they have a mind that does not seek to be deceitful. They attain the fearlessness of having pure speech, because they delight their retinue.

original: ba dang / zab mo'i chos gleng ba'i phyir shes rab mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / khengs pa med pa'i phyir dpyod pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir sengge'i sgra mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ba dang / zab mo'i chos gleng ba'i phyir shes rab mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / khengs pa med pa'i phyir dpyod pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir sengge'i sgra mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They attain the fearlessness of wisdom, because they discuss the profound Dharma. They attain the fearlessness of analysis, because they are free of arrogance. They attain the fearlessness of the lion’s roar, because they defeat all opponents.

original: zang zing med par chos ston pa'i phyir skur pa med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / nyams su len pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir bstan pa kha na ma tho ba med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas ma smad pa'i phyir smad du med pa ma 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: zang zing med par chos ston pa'i phyir skur pa med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / nyams su len pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir bstan pa kha na ma tho ba med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas ma smad pa'i phyir smad du med pa ma 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They attain fearlessness in teaching the Dharma without material reward, fearlessness in teaching without fault, fearlessness in being irreproachable,

original: mdo sde dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir sbyor 'byor mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dus su yang dag par skul ba'i phyir yang dag par skul ba mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mdo sde dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir sbyor 'byor mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dus su yang dag par skul ba'i phyir yang dag par skul ba mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: fearlessness in being well prepared, fearlessness in encouraging others, fearlessness in being unmistaken and fearlessness in being unattached.

original: sems can rnams la 'dud pa'i phyir nga rgyal med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sngon thos pa legs par gzung ba'i phyir tshig dang / yi ge zad mi shes pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos tshad med pa rtogs ba'i phyir thams cad kyi dri ba skabs 'byed pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can rnams la 'dud pa'i phyir nga rgyal med pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sngon thos pa legs par gzung ba'i phyir tshig dang / yi ge zad mi shes pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos tshad med pa rtogs ba'i phyir thams cad kyi dri ba skabs 'byed pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will attain fearlessness in bowing to sentient beings, in being free of pride, in attaining fearlessness in the inexhaustible words and syllables due to having well retained what they have heard in the past, in attaining fearlessness in answering all questions due to realizing immeasurable dharmas,🔽in attaining fearlessness in delighting all retinues due to purifying themselves, in attaining fearlessness in conquering Mara and opponents due to thoroughly knowing all afflictions,

original: bdag nyid yongs su dag bar byed pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad mngon par mgu bar byed pa mi @233b 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyir bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: bdag nyid yongs su dag bar byed pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad mngon par mgu bar byed pa mi @233b 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyir bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom pa mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and in attaining fearlessness in being free of all doubts due to being free of all doubts.

original: zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi 'jigs pa thob bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi 'jigs pa thob bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Because of acting as the king of the Dharma, they attain the fearlessness of the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: klu'i bdag po /
analyzed: klu'i bdag po /
translated: Nāga Lord,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: in this way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs nyan pa dang / mos pa dang / sgrub pa na mi 'jigs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs nyan pa dang / mos pa dang / sgrub pa na mi 'jigs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings listen to, believe in, and practice the dhāraṇī of the inexhaustible casket, they will attain these thirty-two kinds of fearlessness.

original: mi 'jigs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag rgyun ma chad pas na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag rgyun ma chad pas na /
translated: Because of these thirty-two kinds of fearlessness,

original: des mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te /
translated: they will eventually attain the four fearlessnesses of the thus-gone ones.

original: mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i sgra sgrog go /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i sgra sgrog go /
translated: Endowed with these four kinds of fearlessness, the Thus-Gone One roars the lion’s roar in the presence of the world with its gods.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir yang skabs 'byed do //🔽sems can gyi ris na gang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos dang mthun par rgol nus pa'am /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gsung ba mdzad pa la gcod nus pa de lta bu'i sems can ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir yang skabs 'byed do // sems can gyi ris na gang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos dang mthun par rgol nus pa'am / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gsung ba mdzad pa la gcod nus pa de lta bu'i sems can ni /
translated: He also grants permission to answer the questions of all beings.🔽There is no being in the realms of sentient life🔽who could challenge the Thus-Gone One in a way that accords with the Dharma,

original: gang yang med do //
analyzed: gang yang med do //
translated: or who could interrupt the Thus-Gone One’s Dharma discourse.

original: klu'i bdag po /
analyzed: klu'i bdag po /
translated: Nāga Lord,

original: de lta bas na /🔽byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi @234a *//
analyzed: de lta bas na / byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi @234a *//
translated: therefore

original: gzungs 'di la sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs 'di la sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattvas should apply themselves to this inexhaustible casket dhāraṇī.

original: klu'i bdag po /
analyzed: klu'i bdag po /
translated: Nāga Lord,

original: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di la sbyor ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di la sbyor ba gang zhe na /
translated: what is the application to this inexhaustible casket dhāraṇī?

original: gang la mig tu sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: gang la mig tu sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: It is the application to the eye,

original: gzugs su sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: gzugs su sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: the application to form,

original: mig gi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / rna bar sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / rna bar sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with the eye consciousness, nor are they engaged with the ear.

original: sgrar sbyor ba'ang med /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / snar sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: sgrar sbyor ba'ang med / rna ba'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / snar sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with sound.🔽They are not engaged with the nose,

original: drir sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: drir sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: nor are they engaged with smell.

original: sna'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / lcer sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / lcer sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with the nose consciousness, nor are they engaged with the tongue.

original: ror sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: ror sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with taste.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / lus su sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / lus su sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with the tongue consciousness, nor are they engaged with the body.

original: reg byar sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: reg byar sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with touch.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / yid du sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa dang / yid du sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with the body consciousness, nor are they engaged with the mind.

original: chos su sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: chos su sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They are not engaged with phenomena.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med pa de ni /
translated: They are not engaged with the mind consciousness.

original: gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no //
translated: They are engaged with this dhāraṇī.

original: klu'i bdag po /🔽gzhan yang gang la gzugs su sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: klu'i bdag po / gzhan yang gang la gzugs su sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: Nāga Lord,🔽further, they are not engaged with form,

original: gzugs skye bar sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: gzugs skye bar sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: nor are they engaged with the arising of form.

original: gzugs gnas par sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: gzugs gnas par sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They do not apply themselves to the abiding of form.

original: gzugs 'gag par sbyor ba'ang med pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs 'gag par sbyor ba'ang med pa de ni /
translated: They do not apply themselves to the cessation of form.

original: gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no //🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med /🔽rnam par shes pa skye bar sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par sbyor ba'ang med / rnam par shes pa skye bar sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They apply themselves to this dhāraṇī.🔽Similarly, they do not apply themselves to feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.🔽They do not apply themselves to the arising of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa gnas par sbyor ba'ang med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gnas par sbyor ba'ang med /
translated: They do not apply themselves to the abiding of consciousness.
